text: Tum mein se jo log apni biwiyon se zihar (divorce their wives by declaring them to be their mothers) karte hai unki biwiyan unki maayein (mothers) nahin hain. Unki maayein to wahi hai jinhon ne unko jana hai. Yeh log ek sakht napasandeeda aur jhooti baat kehte hain. Aur haqeeqat yeh hai ke Allah bada maaf karne wala aur darguzar farmane wala hai
